origin.description: Root location or authority of the feed.

feeds.description: List of available feeds or resources.

audience.description: Intended audience for the feed (e.g., llm-agents, humans, developers).

trust_level.description: Declared trust or certification level of the feed.

scope.description: Application scope where the feed is intended to be used.

description.description: Natural language description of the feed's content.

keywords.description: Thematic tags aiding discoverability and searchability.

capabilities.description: URI pointing to a capabilities discovery file describing available actions.
